nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model
Class Twist

java.lang.Object
  nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.Partition
      nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.MultipleThreadsPartition
          nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.Switch
              nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model.Twist

public class Twist
extends Switch

A bobbin going over the previous bobbin. Having two bobbins in each hand usually the right bobbins in both hands go over left bobbin in the same hand. A Twist describes what happens in one hand. Note that each pair has it own instances: Though lace makers shorthand describes a cloth stitch as CTC, we will have a left twist and a right twist.

Author:
J. Pol

Constructor Detail

Twist

public Twist(Range range,
             ThreadSegment frontSegment,
             ThreadSegment backSegment)
Parameters:
range - select which threads/bobbins of the parent should be used counting form left to right. Usually the left two bobbins or right two bobbins of a stitch.
frontSegment - represents the thread going from right to left over the other.
backSegment - represents the thread going from left to right behind the other.
